description: Students read and discuss Dostoevsky's major novels from Poor Folk through Brothers Karamazov. Russian majors may take an additional section in the Russian language for major credit in this course. Prerequisite: completion of BTS-T. Offered in alternate years.
name: Dostoevsky-Tr
notes: Prerequisite: Completion of BTS-T or permission of instructor.
Open only to seniors and juniors during web registration.
prerequisites: completion of BTS-T. Offered in alternate years.
